title: Generate 3D Models
desc: Instantly generate high-quality 3D models with AI

modelVersion.title: Version
modelVersion.desc:
V2.5-20250123 Unprecedented detail and fidelity
V2.0-20240919 Industry-leading geometry with PBR

topology.title: Topology
topology.desc: Select quad faces to force output as FBX model.

textureAlignment.title: Texture Alignment
textureAlignment.desc:
Image Aligned: Highly similar to the original image, may has 3D detail variations
Structure Aligned: Maintains precise 3D structure, may slightly differs from the original image

multiViewToModel.imagesTip: Please upload at least one front view plus one side / back view.

setting.autoSizeDesc: Automatically scale the model to real size, in meters.
setting.modelSeedDesc: Seed controls the geometry generation process, models generated with the same seed will be the same
setting.textureSeedDesc: Using the same seed will produce the same texture
setting.pbrDesc: Accurately presenting the appearance of objects by simulating physical properties
